module.sqlWrap: update ent_member set EntId = @EntId, PassportId=@PassportId, MemberStatus=@MemberStatus, JobTitle=@JobTitle, Role=@Role, ModifiedTime=@ModifiedTime where MemberId = @Id
select * from ent_member where EntId = @EntId order by MemberId
select * from ent_member where PassportId = @PassportId order by MemberId
